items.name: anime
items.prompt_value: A full-body character illustration in classic anime style, clean line art, vibrant flat colors, expressive eyes, simple background.

items.name: semi_realistic
items.prompt_value: A semi-realistic anime character illustration, detailed facial features, soft shading, realistic proportions, subtle highlights, elegant pose.

items.name: chibi
items.prompt_value: A chibi character illustration, oversized head, small body, big sparkling eyes, exaggerated cute expression, playful pose.

items.name: watercolor
items.prompt_value: A character illustration in watercolor style, soft and flowing colors, gentle outlines, dreamy atmosphere, light background.

items.name: cyberpunk
items.prompt_value: A character illustration in cyberpunk style, neon lighting, futuristic outfit, cityscape background, dynamic pose, glowing accents.

items.name: fantasy_rpg
items.prompt_value: A character illustration in fantasy RPG style, elaborate costume, magical accessories, heroic pose, mystical background.

items.name: ghiblio
items.prompt_value: A character illustration inspired by Studio Ghibli, soft colors, gentle expressions, natural background, whimsical and heartwarming atmosphere.

items.name: modern_digital_painting
items.prompt_value: A character illustration in modern digital painting style, painterly brush strokes, rich textures, dramatic lighting, dynamic composition.

items.name: Shoujo Sparkle
items.prompt_value: A character illustration in shoujo anime style, sparkling eyes, delicate and flowing hair, pastel and bright colors, floral and starry backgrounds, soft gradients, elegant and fashionable outfits, dreamy and romantic atmosphere.

items.name: Dark Gothic
items.prompt_value: A character illustration in gothic anime style, dark and moody colors, elaborate gothic dresses, lace and frills, crosses and roses, mysterious and dramatic lighting, melancholic and elegant character design, fantasy gothic atmosphere.

items.name: Retro 90s Anime
items.prompt_value: A character illustration in retro 90s anime style, bold outlines, saturated colors, simple and nostalgic backgrounds, expressive and exaggerated facial features, vintage character design, grainy texture, classic anime aesthetics.

items.name: Kawaii Anime
items.prompt_value:
character wearing an animal-eared hoodie,
pastel color palette, soft and gentle shading,
large expressive eyes with a warm and friendly look,
clean and polished character design suitable for a full-body or half-body standing illustration,
cozy indoor atmosphere, playful and heartwarming mood,
adorable small animal companion nearby,
soft lighting, gentle and comforting vibe,
high-quality anime illustration, focus on charm and approachability
